settings.title: A little bliss in every bite

settings.editor: The Pastry Store is true to tradition using only the freshest and finest ingredients. They can create especially for you unique pastries and anything else you may desire by order. Our pastries can decorate your buffet for all your special events, weddings, baptisms, parties, anniversaries, conventions and all business get togethers and will make each event special and enjoyable.
Our pastry shop presents an exquisite culinary experience for any occasion you can imagine!

settings.editor: Bliss provides its customers with high-quality products for the safe production of outstandingly tasting pastry products.
No gluten? No problem. This gorgeous dark chocolate cake gets its flavor and body from dark chocolate and whipped. There’s no need for flour which just leaves more room for the good stuff.
Semisweet chocolate, fresh creamery butter, eggs, sugar, Valrhona cocoa, kosher salt.
